featured.text: Glenn began the day with decorating the Rockefeller Center Christmas tree.

definition.zh_def: 洛克菲勒（John D. Rockefeller）是美國著名的石油大亨和慈善家，創立了標準石油公司，對美國經濟和慈善事業有重大影響。
definition.en_def: Rockefeller refers to John D. Rockefeller, an American oil industry magnate and philanthropist who founded the Standard Oil Company and had a significant impact on the American economy and charitable causes.
definition.example: John D. Rockefeller is often regarded as one of the wealthiest individuals in history.
